reviews.review:
I'm not big on story games.

This game is (and will probably remain) the best example of storytelling in gaming that I have seen.

Gameplay is pretty average, although it is by no means boring and holds up well even a decade later.

Best played in 1-2 sittings.

The story is great, controls are smooth, and guns are fun to use. Graphics are a little dated but still look good for its time.
Half-Life 2 is still the greatest FPS ever made.

Anche se datato, resta un capolavoro. Atmosfere meravigliose, storia interessante con la sceneggiatura ben integrata nel gameplay, e finalmente un fps che pur facendo consumare una bella quantita di munizioni, fa anche lavorare la testa. Eccezionale.

I have never played Half Life 2 in the past. I finished the first one back in the days and then just focused on other games. Now, after completing all the achievements and messing up some massive interdimensional portals, I can honestly say I understand why people see this game as a legend. It still holds incredibly well, and even today you can see all those innovations everyone kept blabering about back then. I believe anyone interested in computer games as a medium should play Half Life 2 at least once.

Buenardo Buenardo

Half-Life 2 has always been this kind of thing that no matter when you play it, no matter how good you think the graphics are, it always seems to amaze in some way, whether it's badassery and shit looking cool, or just how there is some small thing you never noticed after about 15 years of playing. I surely do recommend this game to any of the population of people that don't have it or it's prequel, Half-Life.

2007 год был лучшим для многих... Этому поспособствовало много вещей, среди них уйма отличных игр-шедевров, многие из которых стали классикой или началом великий серий. В этот же год выходит вторая часть Half-Life и у разработчиков было тяжелое задание - сделать игру лучше чем шедевр. И они справились. Среди многообразия других превосходных игр эта давала нам еще один научный шутер с отличной физикой объектов и мира, с приятными персонажами, интересным сюжетом и затягивающими эпичными перестрелками. Игра приятно играется даже сегодня.
Ахуительно восхитительно
The greatest FPS I've ever played. Whatever you enjoy playing, I'd recommend it. 100% worth your money.
I found the physics in this game extremely challenging with puzzles and the new idea for the combine got me hipped for this game

Mi shooter favorito de todos los tiempos y uno de los mejores juegos de la historia. En mi opinión este juego es la perfección de los shooters en primera persona. Su ambientación, su historia, su gameplay... Dios, no he jugado ningún otro shooter que me haya hecho sentir lo mismo que este.

Igual decir que es perfecto es mucho, pero sin dudas es una obra maestra que debes jugar si o si.

This game in my opinion is the best game ever made, it is so well paced, the story is fantastic, the gameplay is engaging and despite being over a decade and a half old, the graphics still manage to hold up pretty well. I've played so many games and yet none have them have come close to topping the experience of playing this game!

A good 15-20 hours of gameplay. It is an excellent continuation of the original game; it has its own narrative and characters while referencing/using what we already have from the first game. I really enjoy the premise, especially.
